thread.title: Maria Mason-Griffith
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by Maria Mason-Griffith

author: Maria Mason-Griffith
title: Maria Mason-Griffith
text: The representatives were very professional, helpful and friendly. My Loan officer was Devian Trotter he gave me all my options and walked me through each one and assisted me with choosing the right mortgage. They made our home buyer experience a breeze compared to original lender. Each of the employees i encountered went over and beyond to assist.
